item.title: Raichur civic forum opposes nuclear plant at RTPS, reiterates AIIMS demand
item.description:
<![CDATA[Top News Of The Day
Raichur: The District Civic Forum strongly opposed the Union govt's move to explore the establishment of a nuclear power plant at the Raichur Thermal Power Station (RTPS) in Shaktinagar, reiterating its long-standing demand for an AIIMS-level medical institution in the district instead.In a press statement issued on Saturday, forum leader Basavaraj Kalasa criticised the Centre's priorities, stating, "While Raichur is seeking an AIIMS, the Union govt is moving to set up a nuc...]]>
item.author: Tnn
